definition: fully considered and perfected, cause to ripen and discharge pus
details:
adjective
- fully considered and perfected
= example: fully considered and perfected
= synonyms: matured
- (of birds) having developed feathers or plumage
= synonyms: fledged
- having reached full natural growth or development
= example: having reached full natural growth or development
- characteristic of maturity
= example: characteristic of maturity
- fully developed or matured and ready to be eaten or used
= synonyms: ripe
verb
- cause to ripen and discharge pus
= synonyms: suppurate
- grow old or older
= synonyms: age, maturate, senesce, get on
- cause to ripen or develop fully
= synonyms: ripen
- develop and reach maturity
= synonyms: maturate, grow
- become due for repayment
= example: become due for repayment
- develop and work out fully in one's mind
= example: develop and work out fully in one's mind
